text: Hagi korapara Israeli vahe'ene Juda vahe'enena kini ne' Deviti kegava huzmantege'za mani'nazane. Hianagi henka Anumzamo Deviti nagapintira Israeli vahera refko hutrege'za zamagra'a zamagiare oti'naze. Anama nehu'za Israeli vahe'mo'za Nebati nemofo Jeroboamuna kini'zamia azeri oti'naze. Hianagi Jeroboamu'a Israeli vahera zamavazu hige'za, Ra Anumzana zamefi humi'za rama'a kumi hu'naze.
